definition: cave/hole/zero (unambiguous spoken form when spelling out numbers)/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Methods Catching by gluing in the cave vicinity and body surface of host's animal.
sentences.chinese: 方法洞穴粘捕法和宿主動物體表檢蚤法。

sentences.english: Then the 'world's largest pothole' was transformed into one of the wonders of the world.
sentences.chinese: 然後，“世界上最大的洞穴”變成了世界奇觀之一。

sentences.english: Painting originated in prehistoric times with murals drawn on cave walls.
sentences.chinese: 繪畫始於史前時期洞穴牆壁上的蹙畫。

sentences.english: Cold, dank caverns are actually not to Reeves’ liking.
sentences.chinese: 李維斯其實並不喜歡這些寒冷而潮溼的洞穴。

sentences.english: Ice caves are a type of natural cave that contain significant amounts of ice.
sentences.chinese: 冰窟就是自然形成內有大量堅冰的洞穴。

sentences.english: With a final beat, and Pedrito's cave burst with hot light.
sentences.chinese: 隨着最後一下敲擊聲，強光突然射入帕吉特呆的洞穴。

sentences.english: And the brink of the dewy caves.
After the caves, all it took to complete a perfect day was a trip to the pub.
sentences.chinese: 參觀洞穴之後，讓泡吧來爲完美的一天畫上句號。

sentences.english: The long time is a darkness moist sultry cavern likely.
sentences.chinese: 冗長的光陰像是一條陰晦溼潤的悶熱洞穴。

sentences.english: They often go potholing on Mount Huashan.
sentences.chinese: 他們常在華山探索洞穴。

sentences.english: Did cavemen think of their paintings as art?
sentences.chinese: 雕洞穴人認爲自己的繪畫是藝術嗎？

sentences.english: The Allegory of the Cave describes four stages through which a person has to pass to get a sound education.
sentences.chinese: 洞穴比喻描述了人要獲得良好教育所必經的四個階段。

sentences.english: The human remains in those caves hadn't been de-fleshed, however.
sentences.chinese: 然而那些洞穴裏的人類屍體並沒有被剝離皮肉。

sentences.english: The cavers discovered a vast underground chamber.
sentences.chinese: 探穴人發現了一個地下大洞穴。

sentences.english: Exploring the Naica caves requires more than just industrial strength water pumps.
sentences.chinese: 進入奈卡洞穴探險需要除工業用水泵外更多的防護。

sentences.english: You can hold up in a cave or somewhere and do this.
sentences.chinese: 這樣找個洞穴也能進行。

definition: Dongkou county in Shaoyang 邵陽|邵阳[Shao4 yang2], Hunan
